fullplot: The story of the relationship between Karamakate, an Amazonian shaman and last survivor of his people, and two scientists who work together over the course of 40 years to search the Amazon for a sacred healing plant.
plot: The story of the relationship between Karamakate, an Amazonian shaman and last survivor of his people, and two scientists who work together over the course of 40 years to search the Amazon for a sacred healing plant.
title: Embrace of the Serpent
writers: Theodor Koch-Grunberg (based on the diary by)
Richard Evan Schultes (based on the diary by)
